Introduce.title: IGNITE KNOWLEDGE AND CREATIVITY WITH REAVOL
Introduce.subtitle: The first Vietnamese application specializing in digital content, promising to bring users high-quality products and excellent experiences
Introduce.watch-video-desc: Listen to books for free with no ads
Introduce.writing-desc: Create freely with diverse and engaging content
Introduce.creator-camp-desc: At Reavol’s Creator Camp, you can upload your own works and earn money from them. Register as a Reavol Contributor today to bring your work closer to book lovers!
Introduce.categories-question: What books do you love the most?
Introduce.unlock-title: Unlock all books for <bold>1 year / lifetime</bold>
Introduce.unlock-item1: Read and listen to over <bold>2500 books across 16 categories</bold>
Introduce.unlock-item2: Easily absorb knowledge from <bold>5 books a day</bold>
Introduce.unlock-item3: Enjoy great book videos <bold>without</bold> being bothered by <bold>ads</bold>
Introduce.unlock-item4: <bold>Read</bold> the first chapter <bold>for free</bold> with <bold>exclusive stories</bold>
Introduce.kocs-benefit1: Receive direct commission percentage from every order
Introduce.kocs-benefit2: Support KOCs in creating content on social media
Introduce.kocs-benefit3: Participate in development strategies with Reavol’s partners
Introduce.kocs-register-subtitle: Are you ready to increase your income with Reavol KOCs?
Introduce.footer-address: Licogi 13 Building, Khuat Duy Tien, Thanh Xuan, Hanoi
